analyzed: gnyis ma lags / mang ba ma lags /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: de ltar na mi 'jigs pa rnams dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te /

analyzed: mang ba ma lags /
translated: nor is it many,

original: tha dad pa ma lags te /
analyzed: tha dad pa ma lags te /

analyzed: de'i slad du mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de mi 'jigs pa rnams ma lags so //
translated: Therefore, Blessed One, whatever decline there is of the fearlessnesses is not the fearlessnesses.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma lags te /

analyzed: de ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te /

original: gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //🔽de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so // de ci'i slad du zhe na /

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: If you ask why, Blessed One, it is because that decline is not one,🔽nor is it two,🔽nor is it many,🔽nor is it otherwise.

analyzed: de'i slad du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma lags so // bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so // de ci'i slad du zhe na / bcom ldan 'das /

original: de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags /
translated: The decrease of the special buddha qualities is not the special buddha qualities.

original: gnyis ma lags /
analyzed: gnyis ma lags /
translated: The decrease of the thirty-two major marks is not the thirty-two major marks.🔽The decrease of the eighty minor marks is not the eighty minor marks.🔽The decrease of the knowledge of all aspects is not the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The decrease of the knowledge of paths is not the knowledge of paths.🔽The decrease of the knowledge of all bases is not the knowledge of all bases.🔽The decrease of the knowledge of all kinds of ready speech is not the knowledge of all kinds of ready speech.🔽The decrease of the knowledge of the thoughts of others is not the knowledge of the thoughts of others.🔽The decrease of the knowledge of the recollective power of former lives is not the knowledge of the recollective power of former lives.🔽The decrease of the knowledge of the exhaustion of the outflows is not the knowledge of the exhaustion of the outflows.🔽The decrease of the superknowledges is not the superknowledges.🔽The decrease of the concentrations is not the concentrations.🔽The decrease of the immeasurables is not the immeasurables.🔽The decrease of the formless concentrations is not the formless concentrations.🔽The decrease of the liberations is not the liberations.

original: mang ba ma lags /
analyzed: mang ba ma lags /
translated: The decrease of the totalities is not the totalities.

original: tha dad pa ma lags te /
analyzed: tha dad pa ma lags te /
translated: The decrease of the deliverances is not the deliverances.🔽The decrease of the emptinesses is not the emptinesses.🔽The decrease of the signless is not the signless.🔽The decrease of the wishless is not the wishless.🔽The decrease of the applications of mindfulness is not the applications of mindfulness.

original: de'i slad du byams pa chen po'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de byams pa chen po ma lags so //🔽bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: de'i slad du byams pa chen po'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de byams pa chen po ma lags so //🔽bcom ldan 'das /
translated: The decrease of the right efforts is not the right efforts.🔽The decrease of the legs of manifestation is not the legs of manifestation.🔽The decrease of the faculties is not the faculties.🔽The decrease of the powers is not the powers.🔽The decrease of the branches of enlightenment is not the branches of enlightenment.🔽The decrease of the path is not the path.🔽The decrease

original: snying rje chen po'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni snying rje chen po ma lags te /
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni snying rje chen po ma lags te /
translated: That which is the decrease of great compassion is not great compassion.

original: de ltar na snying rje chen po dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te /
analyzed: de ltar na snying rje chen po dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te /

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

original: de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags /

original: mang ba ma lags /

analyzed: de'i slad du snying rje chen po'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de snying rje chen po ma lags so //
translated: Therefore, that which is the decrease of great compassion is not great compassion.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

translated: What is called perception is a way of describing something that is not dual and is not not dual.

original: gang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //🔽gang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //🔽gang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su @215b bgyis pa'o //
analyzed: gang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //🔽gang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //🔽gang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su @215b bgyis pa'o //
translated: What is called ‘feeling conditioned by sensory contact that is gustatorily compounded’ is counted as a non-dual phenomenon, without any decrease.

original: gang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //

translated: What is called ‘feeling conditioned by the composite of body’ is counted as a non-dualistic and inexhaustible dharma.

translated: What is called ‘feeling conditioned by the composite of mind’ is counted as a non-dualistic and inexhaustible dharma.🔽What is called ‘the earth element’ is counted as a non-dualistic and inexhaustible dharma.🔽What is called ‘the water element’ is counted as a non-dualistic and inexhaustible dharma.

analyzed: gang me'i khams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //

analyzed: gang rlung gi khams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //

analyzed: gang ma rig pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o // gang 'du byed ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam @216a *//

analyzed: ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
translated: This so-called volitional action is reckoned as a non-dual dharma, not subject to diminution.

analyzed: gang rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //

analyzed: gang sred pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //

original: gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //

original: gang nang stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o /🔽gang phyi stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //

analyzed: gang chen po stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
translated: This ‘emptiness of great immensity’ is counted as a non-dual dharma, without decrease or increase.

original: gang don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bgyi pa 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //🔽gang 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //

analyzed: gang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o // gang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
translated: This so-called emptiness of the unconditioned is reckoned to be a non-dual, undifferentiated Dharma.🔽This so-called emptiness of what is beyond extremes is reckoned to be a non-dual, undifferentiated Dharma.

original: gang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
analyzed: gang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
translated: This so-called emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is reckoned to be a non-dual, undifferentiated Dharma.

original: gang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
analyzed: gang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
translated: This ‘emptiness of what is to be relinquished’ is reckoned as a non-dual, undiminishing phenomenon.

original: gang rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //🔽gang chos thams @217b cad stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
analyzed: gang rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o // gang chos thams @217b cad stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
translated: This ‘emptiness of intrinsic nature’ is reckoned as a non-dual, undiminishing phenomenon.🔽This ‘emptiness of all things’ is reckoned as a non-dual, undiminishing phenomenon.

original: gang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
analyzed: gang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
translated: This ‘emptiness of specific characteristics’ is reckoned as a non-dual, undiminishing phenomenon.

original: gang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
analyzed: gang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
translated: This ‘emptiness of non-apprehension’ is reckoned as a non-dual, undiminishing phenomenon.

original: gang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //🔽gang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
analyzed: gang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o // gang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
translated: This ‘emptiness of non-apprehended things’ is reckoned to be a non-dual, non-dualistic dharma.🔽This ‘emptiness of own-marks’ is reckoned to be a non-dual, non-dualistic dharma.

original: gang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //🔽gang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
analyzed: gang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o // gang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
translated: This ‘emptiness of the non-existence of own-being’ is reckoned to be a non-dual, non-dualistic dharma.🔽This ‘applications of mindfulness’ is reckoned to be a non-dual, non-dualistic dharma.

original: gang yang dag par spong ba rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
analyzed: gang yang dag par spong ba rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
translated: This ‘right efforts’ is reckoned to be a non-dual, non-dualistic dharma.

original: gang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //🔽gang dbang po rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su @218a *//
analyzed: gang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o // gang dbang po rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su @218a *//
translated: The so-called bases of supernatural powers are reckoned to be a non-dual, undifferentiated dharma.

original: ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
analyzed: ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
translated: The so-called faculties are reckoned to be a non-dual, undifferentiated dharma.

original: gang stobs rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
analyzed: gang stobs rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
translated: The so-called powers are reckoned to be a non-dual, undifferentiated dharma.

original: gang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
analyzed: gang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
translated: The so-called limbs of awakening are reckoned to be a non-dual, undifferentiated dharma.

original: gang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
analyzed: gang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
translated: The so-called noble eightfold path is reckoned to be a non-dual, undifferentiated dharma.

original: gang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
analyzed: gang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
translated: This ‘four noble truths’ is reckoned as a non-dual dharma, not a dual dharma.

original: gang bsam gtan rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
analyzed: gang bsam gtan rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
translated: This ‘four formless concentrations’ is reckoned as a non-dual dharma, not a dual dharma.

original: gang tshad med pa nams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
analyzed: gang tshad med pa nams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
translated: This ‘four immeasurables’ is reckoned as a non-dual dharma, not a dual dharma.

original: gang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //🔽gang rnam par thar pa rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
analyzed: gang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //🔽gang rnam par thar pa rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
translated: This ‘four formless absorptions’ is reckoned as a non-dual dharma, not a dual dharma.🔽This ‘four correct exertions’ is reckoned as a non-dual dharma, not a dual dharma.

original: gang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni @218b gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //🔽gang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //🔽gang mngon par shes pa rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
analyzed: gang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni @218b gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o // gang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o // gang mngon par shes pa rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
translated: This is the enumeration of the non-dual and inexhaustible dharmas.🔽This is the enumeration of the non-dual and inexhaustible dharmas.🔽This is the enumeration of the non-dual and inexhaustible dharmas.🔽This is the enumeration of the non-dual and inexhaustible dharmas.

original: gang ting nge 'dzin rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
analyzed: gang ting nge 'dzin rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
translated: This is the enumeration of the non-dual and inexhaustible dharmas.

original: gang gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
analyzed: gang gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
translated: This ‘dhāraṇī gateway’ is reckoned as a non-dual, inexhaustible Dharma.

original: gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
analyzed: gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
translated: This ‘ten powers of the Tathāgata’ is reckoned as a non-dual, inexhaustible Dharma.

original: gang mi 'jigs pa bzhi zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
analyzed: gang mi 'jigs pa bzhi zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
translated: This ‘four fearlessnesses’ is reckoned as a non-dual, inexhaustible Dharma.

original: gang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
analyzed: gang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
translated: This ‘four detailed and thorough knowledges’ is reckoned as a non-dual, inexhaustible Dharma.

original: gang byams pa chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
analyzed: gang byams pa chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
translated: This ‘great love’ is reckoned as a non-dual, inexhaustible Dharma.

original: gang snying rje chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma @219a *//🔽mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
analyzed: gang snying rje chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma @219a *// mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
translated: “That which is called ‘great compassion’ is reckoned as a non-dual, non-dualistic dharma.

original: gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
analyzed: gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
translated: “That which is called ‘the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas’ is reckoned as a non-dual, non-dualistic dharma.

original: gang thams cad shes pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
analyzed: gang thams cad shes pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
translated: “That which is called ‘the knowledge of all phenomena’ is reckoned as a non-dual, non-dualistic dharma.

original: gang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
analyzed: gang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
translated: “That which is called ‘the knowledge of the aspects of the path’ is reckoned as a non-dual, non-dualistic dharma.

original: gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
analyzed: gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o //
translated: “That which is called ‘the knowledge of all aspects’ is reckoned as a non-dual, non-dualistic dharma.”

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
translated: The Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: le'u bcu gnyis pa'o ////🔽de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus /
analyzed: le'u bcu gnyis pa'o //// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus /
translated: Chapter XII

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Then the venerable Śāradvatī­putra said to the venerable Su­bhūti as follows:

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: “Venerable Su­bhūti!

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: When bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: chos 'di dag la ni ji ltar yongs su rtog /
analyzed: chos 'di dag la ni ji ltar yongs su rtog /
translated: how do they investigate these phenomena?

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Venerable Su­bhūti!

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni gang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni gang /
translated: What is a bodhisattva?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang /
translated: What is the perfection of wisdom?

original: yongs su rtog pa ni gang /
analyzed: yongs su rtog pa ni gang /
translated: What is investigation?

original: de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: ” The venerable Su­bhūti then replied to the venerable Śāradvatī­putra as follows:

original: tshe dang ldan pa @219b sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa @219b sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatī­putra!

original: gang 'di skad du /
analyzed: gang 'di skad du /
translated: You have asked:

original: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhes zer ba ni /
translated: ‘What is a bodhisattva?’

original: gang gi phyir sems can byang chub yin pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir sems can byang chub yin pa de'i phyir /
translated: Because sentient beings are enlightenment,

original: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
translated: therefore, it is called “enlightenment being.”

original: byang chub des kyang chos thams cad kyi rnam pa shes te chos de dag la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: byang chub des kyang chos thams cad kyi rnam pa shes te chos de dag la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: And through that enlightenment, they know the aspects of all phenomena, but they do not settle down on those phenomena.

original: chos gang gi rnam pa shes she na /
analyzed: chos gang gi rnam pa shes she na /
translated: What are the aspects of phenomena that they know?

original: gzugs kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //🔽tshor ba'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: gzugs kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do // tshor ba'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of form, but do not settle down on them.🔽They know the aspects of feeling, but do not settle down on them.

original: 'du shes kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: 'du shes kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of perception, but do not settle down on them.

original: 'du byed kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of volitional factors, but do not settle down on them.

original: rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of consciousness, but do not settle down on them.

original: mig gi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: mig gi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of the eyes, but do not settle down on them.

original: rna ba'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of the ears, but do not settle down on them.

original: sna'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: sna'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the features of the nose, but are not attached to them.

original: lce'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: lce'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the features of the tongue, but are not attached to them.

original: lus kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the features of the body, but are not attached to them.

original: yid kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the features of the mind, but are not attached to them.

original: gzugs kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: gzugs kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the features of sights, but are not attached to them.

original: sgra'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //🔽dri'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: sgra'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do // dri'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the features of sounds, but are not attached to them.🔽They know the features of smells, but are not attached to them.

original: ro'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //🔽reg gi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par @220a *//
analyzed: ro'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do // reg gi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par @220a *//
translated: They know the features of tastes, but are not attached to them.

original: chags pa med do //
analyzed: chags pa med do //
translated: They know the features of touches, but are not attached to them.

original: chos kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: chos kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the features of mental phenomena, but are not attached to them.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the consciousness of the eye, but are not attached to it.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do // sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of the ear consciousness but are not attached to them.🔽They know the aspects of the nose consciousness but are not attached to them.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rnam par shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rnam par shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of the tongue consciousness but are not attached to them.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of the body consciousness but are not attached to them.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of the mind consciousness but are not attached to them.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of eye contact but are not attached to them.🔽They know the aspects of ear contact but are not attached to them.🔽They know the aspects of nose contact but are not attached to them.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of tongue contact but are not attached to them.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He knows the aspects of the body’s composite, but he is not attached to them.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He knows the aspects of the mind’s composite, but he is not attached to them.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //🔽sna'i @220b 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do // sna'i @220b 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He knows the aspects of the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact, but he is not attached to them.🔽He knows the aspects of the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact, but he is not attached to them.🔽He knows the aspects of the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact, but he is not attached to them.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He knows the aspects of the feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact, but he is not attached to them.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He knows the aspects of the feeling that arises from the condition of body contact, but he is not attached to them.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He knows the aspects of the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of mental faculty, object of consciousness, and mind, but he is not attached to them.

original: sa'i khams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: sa'i khams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He knows the aspects of the earth element, but he is not attached to them.

original: chu'i khams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: chu'i khams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He knows the aspects of the water element, but he is not attached to them.

original: me'i khams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //🔽rlung gi khams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: me'i khams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do // rlung gi khams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He knows the aspects of the fire element, but he is not attached to them.🔽He knows the aspects of the wind element, but he is not attached to them.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //🔽rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do // rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He knows the aspects of the space element, but he is not attached to them.🔽He knows the aspects of the consciousness element, but he is not attached to them.

original: ma rig pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He knows the aspects of ignorance, but he is not attached to them.

original: 'du byed kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He knows the aspects of volitional factors, but he is not attached to them.

original: rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of consciousness, but they are not attached to them.

original: ming dang gzugs kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of name and form, but they are not attached to them.

original: skye mched drug gi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: skye mched drug gi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of the six sense sources, but they are not attached to them.

original: reg pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: reg pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of contact, but they are not attached to them.

original: tshor ba'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags @221a *//🔽pa med do //🔽srid pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //🔽len pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: tshor ba'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags @221a *// pa med do // srid pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do // len pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of feeling, but they are not attached to them.🔽They know the aspects of craving, but they are not attached to them.🔽They know the aspects of appropriation, but they are not attached to them.

original: srid pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: srid pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of existence, but they are not attached to them.

original: skye ba'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: skye ba'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of birth, but they are not attached to them.

original: rga shi'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: rga shi'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of old age and death, but they are not attached to them.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of the perfection of generosity, but they are not attached to them.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of the perfection of morality, but they are not attached to them.🔽They know the aspects of the perfection of patience, but they are not attached to them.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of the perfection of perseverance, but they are not attached to them.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of the perfection of concentration, but they are not attached to them.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //🔽nang stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do // nang stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of the perfection of wisdom, but they are not attached to them.🔽They know the aspects of inner emptiness, but they are not attached to them.

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of outer emptiness, but they are not attached to them.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of the emptiness of the external and the internal, but they have no attachment to them.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of the emptiness of emptiness, but they have no attachment to them.

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //🔽don dam pa @221b stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do // don dam pa @221b stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of the emptiness of the great, but they have no attachment to them.🔽They know the aspects of the emptiness of ultimate reality, but they have no attachment to them.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, but they have no attachment to them.🔽They know the aspects of the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, but they have no attachment to them.🔽They know the aspects of the emptiness of the unlimited, but they have no attachment to them.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, but they have no attachment to them.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspect of emptiness that is not to be discarded, but they do not settle down on it.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspect of the emptiness of inherent natures, but they do not settle down on it.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspect of the emptiness of all phenomena, but they do not settle down on it.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspect of the emptiness of defining characteristics, but they do not settle down on it.🔽They know the aspect of the emptiness of non-apprehension, but they do not settle down on it.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspect of the emptiness of non-entities, but they do not settle down on it.🔽They know the aspect of the emptiness of essential nature, but they do not settle down on it.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspect of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities, but they do not settle down on it.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of the applications of mindfulness, but they do not settle down on them.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of the right efforts, but they do not settle down on them.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams @222a *//
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams @222a *//
translated: They know the aspects of the bases of supernatural powers,

original: kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //🔽dbang po rnams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do // dbang po rnams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: but they do not settle down on them.🔽They know the aspects of the faculties, but they do not settle down on them.

original: stobs rnams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: stobs rnams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of the powers, but they do not settle down on them.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of the limbs of awakening, but they do not settle down on them.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of the noble eightfold path, but they do not settle down on them.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of the noble truths, but they do not settle down on them.

original: bsam gtan rnams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //🔽tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do // tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of the meditative stabilities, but they do not rest in them.🔽They know the aspects of the formless absorptions, but they do not rest in them.🔽They know the aspects of the emptiness meditative stabilization, the signlessness meditative stabilization, and the aspirationlessness meditative stabilization, but they do not rest in them.🔽They know the aspects of the applications of mindfulness, but they do not rest in them.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of the right efforts, but they do not rest in them.🔽They know the aspects of the legs of miraculous power, but they do not rest in them.🔽They know the aspects of the faculties, but they do not rest in them.🔽They know the aspects of the powers, but they do not rest in them.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of the branches of awakening, but they do not rest in them.🔽They know the aspects of the path, but they do not rest in them.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of the ten powers, but they do not rest in them.🔽They know the aspects of the four fearlessnesses, but they do not rest in them.🔽They know the aspects of the four detailed and thorough knowledges, but they do not rest in them.🔽They know the aspects of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, but they do not rest in them.🔽They know the aspects of the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening, but they do not rest in them.🔽They know the aspects of the emptiness meditative stabilization, the signlessness meditative stabilization, and the aspirationlessness meditative stabilization, but they do not rest in them.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening, but they do not rest in them.🔽They know the aspects of the ten powers, but they do not rest in them.🔽They know the aspects of the four fearlessnesses, but they do not rest in them.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of the four detailed and thorough knowledges, but they do not rest in them.🔽They know the aspects of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, but they do not rest in them.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening, but they do not rest in them.🔽They know the aspects of the ten powers, but they do not rest in them.🔽They know the aspects of the four fearlessnesses, but they do not rest in them.

original: gzungs kyi @222b sgo rnams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: gzungs kyi @222b sgo rnams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of the dhāraṇī gateways but are not attached to them.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of the tathāgata powers but are not attached to them.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of the fearlessnesses but are not attached to them.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //🔽byams pa chen po'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do // byams pa chen po'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of the detailed and thorough knowledges but are not attached to them.🔽They know the aspects of great love but are not attached to them.

original: snying rje chen po'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of great compassion but are not attached to them.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rnam pa shes te de la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They know the aspects of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha but are not attached to them.

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Śāriputra then asked, “Venerable Subhūti,

original: chos thams cad kyi rnam pa gang yin /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi rnam pa gang yin /
translated: what are the aspects of all phenomena?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,🔽“Venerable Śāriputra,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: rnam pa gang dang / tshul gang dang / mtshan ma gang gis chos rnams rnam pa yod par bya ba ste /
analyzed: rnam pa gang dang / tshul gang dang / mtshan ma gang gis chos rnams rnam pa yod par bya ba ste /
translated: by what aspects, what modes, and what signs are phenomena to be made into aspects?

original: 'di ltar 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams gzugs sam /🔽sgra'am / dri'am /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams gzugs sam / sgra'am / dri'am /
translated: Thus, conditioned and unconditioned phenomena are form,🔽sound,🔽smell,🔽taste,

original: ro'am / reg gam /
analyzed: ro'am / reg gam /
translated: or touch.

original: chen po stong pa nyid las ring du song bas na /🔽de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid las ring du song bas na / de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
translated: It is the perfection of wisdom because it has gone far from the emptiness of the great.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid las ring du song bas na /🔽de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid las ring du song bas na / de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
translated: It is the perfection of wisdom because it has gone far from the emptiness of the ultimate.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid las ring du song bas na /🔽de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid las ring du song bas na / de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
translated: It is the perfection of wisdom because it has gone far from the emptiness of the conditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las ring du song bas na /🔽de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las ring du song bas na / de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
translated: It is the perfection of wisdom because it has gone far from the emptiness of the unconditioned.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las ring du song bas na /🔽de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o /🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid las ring du song bas na /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las ring du song bas na / de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid las ring du song bas na /
translated: It is the perfection of wisdom because it has gone far from the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
translated: It is the perfection of wisdom because it has gone far from the emptiness of what is without beginning or end.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las ring du song bas na /🔽de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las ring du song bas na / de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
translated: It is the far-reaching perfection because it goes far beyond the emptiness of non-rejection.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid las ring du song bas na /🔽de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //🔽chos thams cad stong pa nyid las ring du song bas na /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid las ring du song bas na / de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o // chos thams cad stong pa nyid las ring du song bas na /
translated: It is the far-reaching perfection because it goes far beyond the emptiness of nature.

original: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
translated: It is the far-reaching perfection because it goes far beyond the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las ring du song bas na /🔽de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las ring du song bas na / de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
translated: It is the far-reaching perfection because it goes far beyond the emptiness of specific characteristics.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las ring du song bas na /🔽de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las ring du song bas na / de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
translated: It is the far-reaching perfection because it goes far beyond the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las ring du song bas na /🔽de'i @224a *// phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las ring du song bas na /

translated: It is the far-reaching perfection because it goes far beyond the emptiness of non-things.

original: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
translated: It is the far-reaching perfection because it goes far beyond the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las ring du song bas na /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las ring du song bas na /

original: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams las ring du song bas na /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams las ring du song bas na /
translated: It is the perfection of the far-reaching, because it is the far-reaching perfection of the applications of mindfulness.

original: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams las ring du song bas na /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams las ring du song bas na /

original: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called the far-reaching perfection.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las ring du song bas na /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las ring du song bas na /

original: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called the far-reaching perfection.

original: dbang po rnams las ring du song bas na /
analyzed: dbang po rnams las ring du song bas na /

original: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called the far-reaching perfection.

original: stobs rnams las ring du song bas na /
analyzed: stobs rnams las ring du song bas na /

original: de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o //

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽gang yang 'di skad du /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu / gang yang 'di skad du /

original: yongs su rtag pa gang zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: yongs su rtag pa gang zhes zer ba ni /
translated: you have asked, ‘What is thorough investigation?’

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatī­putra,

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: in this regard, when great bodhisattva beings practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom,

original: gzugs rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: gzugs rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: they do not thoroughly investigate whether physical forms are permanent or impermanent,

original: gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: they do not thoroughly investigate whether physical forms are imbued with happiness or suffering,

original: gzugs bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: gzugs bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: they do not thoroughly investigate whether physical forms are self or not self,

original: gzugs sdug ces bya ba dang mi sdug ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: gzugs sdug ces bya ba dang mi sdug ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: they do not thoroughly investigate whether physical forms are attractive or unattractive,

original: gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: they do not thoroughly investigate whether physical forms are empty or not empty,

original: gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: they do not thoroughly investigate whether physical forms are with signs or signless,

original: gzugs smon pa yod ces bya ba dang smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: gzugs smon pa yod ces bya ba dang smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the notion that physical forms are with or without aspirations.

original: gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /

translated: “They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the condition of contact at the body as being permanent or impermanent.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the condition of contact through the coming together of the eye, the eye consciousness, and visual forms, thinking, ‘The condition of contact through the coming together of the eye, the eye consciousness, and visual forms is pleasant’ or ‘The condition of contact through the coming together of the eye, the eye consciousness, and visual forms is unpleasant.’

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the condition of contact through the coming together of the eye, the eye consciousness, and visual forms, thinking, ‘The condition of contact through the coming together of the eye, the eye consciousness, and visual forms is a self’ or ‘The condition of contact through the coming together of the eye, the eye consciousness, and visual forms is not a self.’

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the condition of contact through the coming together of the eye, the eye consciousness, and visual forms, thinking, ‘The condition of contact through the coming together of the eye, the eye consciousness, and visual forms is beautiful’ or ‘The condition of contact through the coming together of the eye, the eye consciousness, and visual forms is not beautiful.’

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i @235b rkyen gyis tshor ba stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i @235b rkyen gyis tshor ba stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the condition of contact through the coming together of the eye, the eye consciousness, and visual forms, thinking, ‘The condition of contact through the coming together of the eye, the eye consciousness, and visual forms is empty’ or ‘The condition of contact through the coming together of the eye, the eye consciousness, and visual forms is not empty.’

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the condition of contact through the coming together of the eye, the eye consciousness, and visual forms, thinking, ‘The condition of contact through the coming together of the eye, the eye consciousness, and visual forms has signs’ or ‘The condition of contact through the coming together of the eye, the eye consciousness, and visual forms is signless.’

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the condition of contact through the coming together of the eye, the eye consciousness, and visual forms, thinking, ‘The condition of contact through the coming together of the eye, the eye consciousness, and visual forms is having aspirations’ or ‘The condition of contact through the coming together of the eye, the eye consciousness, and visual forms is without aspirations.’

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the condition of contact through the coming together of the body, thinking that it is peaceful or that it is not peaceful.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the condition of contact through the coming together of the body, thinking that it is void or that it is not void.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the condition of contact through the coming together of the mind, thinking that it is permanent or that it is impermanent.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the condition of contact through the coming together of the mind, thinking that it is imbued with happiness or that it is imbued with suffering.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the condition of contact through the coming together of the mind, thinking that it is a self or that it is a non-self.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the condition of contact through the coming together of the mind, thinking that it is beautiful or that it is ugly.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the condition of contact through the coming together of the mental faculty, thinking that it is empty or not empty.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /🔽yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba smon @236a *//
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba smon @236a *//
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the condition of contact through the coming together of the mental faculty, thinking that it is with signs or signless.

original: pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the condition of contact through the coming together of the mental faculty, thinking that it is having aspirations or lacking aspirations.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the condition of contact through the coming together of the mental faculty, thinking that it is calm or not calm.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the condition of contact through the coming together of the mental faculty, thinking that it is void or not void.

original: sa'i khams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: sa'i khams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the earth element, thinking that it is permanent or impermanent.

original: sa'i khams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: sa'i khams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think in terms of the earth element as happiness or suffering.

original: sa'i khams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: sa'i khams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think in terms of the earth element as a self or not a self.

original: sa'i khams sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: sa'i khams sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think in terms of the earth element as beautiful or ugly.

original: sa'i khams stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: sa'i khams stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think in terms of the earth element as empty or not empty.

original: sa'i khams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: sa'i khams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think in terms of the earth element as with signs or signless.

original: sa'i khams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: sa'i khams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think in terms of the earth element as having aspirations or lacking aspirations.

original: sa'i khams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: sa'i khams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think in terms of the earth element as calm or not calm.

original: sa'i khams dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: sa'i khams dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think in terms of the earth element as void or not void.

original: chu'i khams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: chu'i khams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs on account of the element of water, thinking that it is permanent or that it is impermanent.

original: chu'i khams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: chu'i khams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /

analyzed: chu'i khams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba @236b bar yongs su mi rtog go /

analyzed: chu'i khams sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /

original: chu'i khams stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: chu'i khams stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs on account of the element of water, thinking that it is empty or that it is not empty.🔽They do not form mental constructs on account of the element of water, thinking that it has substance or that it is insubstantial.

original: chu'i khams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: chu'i khams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs on account of the element of water, thinking that it is with signs or that it is signless.

original: chu'i khams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: chu'i khams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs on account of the element of water, thinking that it is having aspirations or that it is without aspirations.

original: chu'i khams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: chu'i khams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs on account of the element of water, thinking that it is calm or that it is not calm.

original: chu'i khams dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su me rtog go /
analyzed: chu'i khams dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su me rtog go /
translated: They do not form any conceptual thoughts about the element of water, thinking that it is empty or not empty.

original: me'i khams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: me'i khams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form any conceptual thoughts about the element of fire, thinking that it is permanent or that it is impermanent.

analyzed: me'i khams sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /

analyzed: me'i khams stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form any conceptual thoughts about the element of fire, thinking that it is empty or that it is not empty.🔽They do not form any conceptual thoughts about the element of fire, thinking that it has a core or that it is coreless.

original: me'i khams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: me'i khams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /

analyzed: me'i khams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /

analyzed: me'i khams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /

translated: They do not conceptually differentiate the fire element as void or not void.

translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the element of wind as being with signs or signless.🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the element of wind as being calm or not calm.

original: nam mkha'i khams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the element of space as being permanent or impermanent.

translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about grasping in terms of being with wishes or wishless.

original: len pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: len pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /

original: len pa dben zhes bya ba dang / @240b mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: len pa dben zhes bya ba dang / @240b mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not conceptually differentiate grasping as void or not void.

original: srid pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: srid pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not conceptually differentiate existence as permanent or impermanent.

original: srid pa bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: srid pa bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /

original: srid pa bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: srid pa bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not conceptually differentiate existence as a self or not a self.

original: srid pa sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: srid pa sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /

analyzed: srid pa stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /

analyzed: srid pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not conceptually differentiate existence as having a sign or signless.

original: srid pa smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: srid pa smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /

original: srid pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /🔽srid pa dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /

original: skye ba rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /🔽skye ba bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: skye ba rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go / skye ba bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about conditioned existence as being void or not being void.🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts about conditioned existence as being empty or not being empty.🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts about conditioned existence as being with signs or as being signless.🔽They do not form mental constructs or concepts about conditioned existence as being with wishes or as being wishless.

analyzed: skye ba bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
